name: Color Mix
description:
Color Mix is a local 3-players cooperative runner. Each player is assigned to a color (red, blue and yellow) and must work with the others to toggle switchs, activate platforms  and mix colors to get the player to the goal. It also contains a single-player mode, where one player controls all three colors.

This game is a student game developed during a local game jam.

Controls Single Player (Best with Keyboard and Mouse):

Mouse: Move the cursor
Left Click: Toggle platforms
1(&): Choose the color RED
2(é): Choose the color BLUE
3("): Choose the color YELLOW

Controls Multiplayer (Best with Controller):

Left Stick: Move the cursor
A: Toggle platforms
